context: Doximity is the dominant professional network for US physicians with 80%+ market share. The company generates revenue from pharmaceutical marketing, telehealth, and physician recruitment.

competitors.name: LinkedIn
competitors.notes: Microsoft's professional network used by some physicians

competitors.name: Medscape
competitors.notes: Medical news, CME, and drug information

competitors.name: UpToDate
competitors.notes: Clinical decision support used by physicians

competitors.name: ZocDoc
competitors.notes: Patient-facing but competes for physician attention
